channel.title: Comments on: Grid class that allows sorting by clicking on headers
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: abhiruk
item.dc:creator: abhiruk
item.description:
I'm really sorry, I have tried to use this class many time but it's not successful.could you please explain to me again.(I'm a vfp beginner)
Thank you in advance
item.content:encoded:
I’m really sorry, I have tried to use this class many time but it’s not successful.could you please explain to me again.(I’m a vfp beginner)

Thank you in advance

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: At the bottom of this blog, there is a zip file to download. Once you downloaded the file, you can put this grid class directly into the form and use in your applications as is.
item.content:encoded: At the bottom of this blog, there is a zip file to download. Once you downloaded the file, you can put this grid class directly into the form and use in your applications as is.

item.title: By: Al Carlson
item.dc:creator: Al Carlson
item.content:encoded:
I am still learning the many facets of FVP9. I would like to know how to incorporate your grid sort control into my applications. I do not know a lot about how to make .vcx files work and a little less about Classes. I would like to ask you how to make this work.

Rgards..Al

item.title: By: Francis Coppage
item.dc:creator: Francis Coppage
item.content:encoded:
I have one I did eons ago, but you’ve made it so generic. I had to make sure everything I wanted sorted had tags and “fill in all the little boxes” every time I wanted to use it.

Thanks for nice piece of work!!!

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: My pleasure. I plan to publish one more VFP based class I made recently (Multiselect Listbox acting like a combobox). Just need some time.
item.content:encoded: My pleasure. I plan to publish one more VFP based class I made recently (Multiselect Listbox acting like a combobox). Just need some time.

item.title: By: Koen
item.dc:creator: Koen
item.description: Great class, thanks for sharing with us!
item.content:encoded: Great class, thanks for sharing with us!

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Thanks. There is a program for syntax highlighting in VFP (written in VFP) It can be downloaded from http://www.universalthread.com/Report.aspx?Session=3950396F5A4171707070773D20657A79474D532F4A2B39664852672B342F644647512F686E776D504A354C724D

item.title: By: riverguy
item.dc:creator: riverguy
item.description: Nice...good to see a VFP blog. Chrissie better get to work on the syntax highlighting for VFP ;)
